name: EvoxMeditation
0:
”Alexa, open evox meditation”
”Alexa, ask evox meditation to start today's meditation”
”Alexa, ask evox meditation to help me sleep”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: evox meditation
des: Meditation is different for each of us, and what works for one may not resonate with another. Use evox Meditation to explore your own unique way into health and wellness. Focus your practice on specific areas (gratitude, healing, stress, physical awareness, sleep, relaxation,focus, and more) or choose each day from whatever area could use a bit of kind commitment at that moment. evoxLife uses guided meditation for your exploration into clarity and consciousness, optimizing your own wisdom and energy.
